issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: The HCFS contract test testRenameFileBeingAppended doesn't do a rename

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

+1, thanks [~zxu]. These test failures look unrelated to the patch. They were reported by HDFS-8772 and HDFS-7553.
thanks for the review [~ajisakaa]! Will commit the patch shortly.
HADOOP-12268.001.patch has change in hdfs project. Split the patch to two changes:  AbstractContractAppendTest.java for HADOOP-12268 and TestHDFSContractAppend.java for HDFS-8847.
I committed the patch to trunk and branch-2.
